profile.name: Atharv Tare
profile.title: Software Development Engineer I
profile.bio: SDE-I with 3 years of experience designing and maintaining scalable backend services while handling 5M user base and 400K MAU, specializing in MongoDB-powered applications and cloud-native deployments.

resumes.title: SDE-1 (Backend)
resumes.description: Backend development, APIs, and system architecture

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer I
achievements: Designed and maintained highly scalable backend services using Node.js and Go, supporting over 5M users and 400K monthly active users (MAU), ensuring robust performance under high traffic loads.

Refactored core architecture and optimized Express.js-based APIs, achieving a 3x reduction in average load times and improving response latency by 65% through efficient caching and query optimization in MongoDB.

Led the migration of critical data workflows to Kafka-based event-driven pipelines, enhancing fault tolerance by 40%, scalability for peak loads, and throughput by 50%, enabling seamless real-time data processing.

Instrumented comprehensive real-time monitoring and alerting systems using Prometheus and Signoz, reducing system downtime by 30% and cutting incident response time by 45% through proactive issue detection.
Managed multi-environment deployments across production, analytics, and development clusters using Kubernetes, orchestrating seamless database migrations for MongoDB with zero downtime.

Developed and implemented automated deployment and rollback workflows with ArgoCD and Kubernetes, increasing release velocity by 60% and improving deployment reliability with automated health checks and rollback mechanisms.
Enhanced system observability by integrating advanced error tracking and logging with Signoz, reducing API failure rates by 25% through targeted improvements in error handling and retry logic.

Collaborated with mobile and product teams to integrate backend services with high-scale Android and iOS applications, ensuring seamless API performance and compatibility for over 1M concurrent users.
Implemented Google Analytics and custom event tracking pipelines, driving a 20% increase in click-through rates (CTR) and a 15% improvement in user monetization through data-driven optimizations.
Designed and deployed containerized microservices on AWS (ECS/EKS), optimizing resource utilization and reducing infrastructure costs by 18% while maintaining 99.9% uptime.

projects.name: Scalable User Platform
projects.description: Built and maintained backend services supporting millions of users with Node.js, Go, and MongoDB.
projects.impact: Enabled robust performance for 5M+ users and 400K MAU with high reliability.
highlights: Architected event-driven pipelines for real-time data processing
Optimized API response latency and load times
Integrated monitoring and alerting for proactive issue detection

projects.name: Microservices Deployment Automation
projects.description: Automated deployment and rollback workflows for containerized microservices on AWS using Kubernetes and ArgoCD.
projects.impact: Increased release velocity and deployment reliability with zero downtime migrations.
highlights: Implemented automated health checks and rollback mechanisms
Reduced infrastructure costs while maintaining high uptime

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer
achievements: Developed custom email solution for automating and extracting data, handling full project lifecycle from design to deployment.
Designed responsive UI with intuitive forms and dashboard for seamless data input and visualization.
Built scalable backend using Node.js and MongoDB, capable of handling large amounts of data with reliable service delivery.
Integrated various APIs for seamless data extraction and automated email processing workflows.
Collaborated closely with client throughout development process, ensuring requirements alignment and successful delivery.
Deployed production-ready solution with optimized performance and stability on client servers.

projects.name: Custom Email Automation Platform
projects.description: Full-stack email solution with automated data extraction, responsive dashboard, and API integrations.
projects.impact: Streamlined client operations and enabled valuable data extraction from email campaigns.
highlights: End-to-end development from UI design to production deployment
Scalable backend architecture for large data processing
Seamless API integrations for automated workflows

experiences.title: SDE-1 (Intern)
achievements: Refactored legacy Android codebases, introducing MVVM architecture and Dependency Injection to improve maintainability and scalability.
Developed and integrated unit and instrumentation tests, increasing code coverage and reliability for production releases.
Enhanced debugging workflows and automated build processes, reducing release cycle time and improving team productivity.
Collaborated with senior engineers to migrate critical features to modern Android APIs, resulting in improved app performance and stability.
Contributed to feature development and bug fixes for live applications, supporting successful production deployments.

personalProjects.title: Media-Centric Booking System
personalProjects.description: Developed RESTful APIs for a movie booking platform with advanced reporting, analytics, and real-time reservation tracking. Integrated role-based authentication and JWT for secure access.

personalProjects.title: Cross-DB Backup Tool
personalProjects.description: Built CLI tools for backup and restore operations across MongoDB, PostgreSQL, and SQLite databases. Automated Slack notifications for backup status and integrated S3 for cloud storage.

personalProjects.title: Real-Time Chat API
personalProjects.description: Developed a scalable chat API using Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB, supporting real-time messaging for thousands of concurrent users.

personalProjects.title: Event-Driven Notification Service
personalProjects.description: Built a notification microservice using Go and Kafka, enabling real-time alerts and updates for user activities.

personalProjects.title: API Monitoring Dashboard
personalProjects.description: Implemented a dashboard for monitoring API health and performance using Prometheus and Signoz.
